abilities.description: The user blows a kiss that creates a heart-shaped bullet to fire at a target, potentially petrifying them. Can be combined with Armament Haki.
The user can petrify others who feel lust or attraction toward them, or through direct contact with their powers.

weaknesses.weakness: The petrification effect does not work on those who feel no lust or attraction toward the user
weaknesses.description: Luffy was completely immune to Hancock's Mero Mero powers because he felt no romantic or lustful attraction toward her, demonstrating a key limitation of the fruit.

keyMoments.title: Pistol Kiss Debut
keyMoments.description: Hancock uses Pistol Kiss on Luffy for the first time, but it fails to petrify him.
keyMoments.significance: First use of this technique and reveals the fruit's weakness against those without attraction.

keyMoments.title: Petrifies Three Kuja Warriors
keyMoments.description: Hancock demonstrates that she can petrify people without requiring them to feel attraction, using direct application of her powers on Marguerite, Sweet Pea, and Aphelandra.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the versatility of the Mero Mero no Mi beyond its attraction-based petrification.

name.japanese: ヘビヘビの実 モデル：アナコンダ
name.romanized: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Moderu: Anakonda

abilities.description: The user can transform into an anaconda-human hybrid or a full anaconda. In hybrid form, the user gains tremendous size, strength, and constricting abilities.

keyMoments.title: First Transformation
keyMoments.description: Sandersonia transforms into her anaconda-human hybrid form for the first time, preparing to fight Luffy in the arena.
keyMoments.significance: Debut of the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda and establishes Sandersonia as a Zoan user.

name.japanese: ヘビヘビの実 モデル：キングコブラ
name.romanized: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Moderu: Kingu Kobura

abilities.description: The user can transform into a king cobra-human hybrid or a full king cobra. In hybrid form, the user gains tremendous size, strength, and can produce venom.

keyMoments.title: First Transformation
keyMoments.description: Marigold transforms into her king cobra-human hybrid form for the first time, preparing to fight Luffy in the arena.
keyMoments.significance: Debut of the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra and establishes Marigold as a Zoan user.
